CostAdjustNoteSqlResource.SelectIncludeAll: SELECT [CostAdjustNotes].Id,[CostAdjustNotes].AdjustAmount,[CostAdjustNotes].AuditState,[CostAdjustNotes].AuditRemark,[CostAdjustNotes].IsDeleted,[CostAdjustNotes].CreateTime,[CostAdjustNotes].Product_Id,[CostAdjustNotes].StoreHouse_Id,[CostAdjustNotes].BusinessTime,[StoreHouse].Id Id,[StoreHouseOrg].NewId NewId,[StoreHouseOrg].Name Name,[City].Id Id,[City].NewId NewId,[City].Name Name,[Product].Id Id,[Product].NewId NewId,[ProductInfo].Id Id,[ProductInfo].NewId NewId,[ProductInfo].Desc_ProductName ProductName FROM dbo.CostAdjustNotes WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.StoreHouse WITH(NOLOCK) ON StoreHouse.Id = CostAdjustNotes.StoreHouse_Id INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs StoreHouseOrg WITH(NOLOCK) ON StoreHouseOrg.Id=dbo.StoreHouse.Id INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs City WITH(NOLOCK) ON City.Id=CostAdjustNotes.City_Id INNER JOIN dbo.Product WITH(NOLOCK) ON Product.Id = CostAdjustNotes.Product_Id INNER JOIN dbo.ProductInfo WITH(NOLOCK) ON Info_Id=ProductInfo.Id
CostAdjustNoteSqlResource.FirstOrDefaultIncludeAll: SELECT [CostAdjustNotes].Id,[CostAdjustNotes].AdjustAmount,[CostAdjustNotes].AuditState,[CostAdjustNotes].AuditRemark,[CostAdjustNotes].IsDeleted,[CostAdjustNotes].CreateTime,[CostAdjustNotes].Product_Id,[CostAdjustNotes].StoreHouse_Id,[CostAdjustNotes].BusinessTime,[StoreHouse].Id Id,[StoreHouseOrg].NewId NewId,[StoreHouseOrg].Name Name,StoreHouse.Shop_Id,Product.City_Id,[City].Id Id,[City].NewId NewId,[City].Name Name,[Product].Id Id,[Product].NewId NewId,[ProductInfo].Id Id,[ProductInfo].NewId NewId,[ProductInfo].Desc_ProductName ProductName FROM dbo.CostAdjustNotes WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.StoreHouse WITH(NOLOCK) ON StoreHouse.Id = CostAdjustNotes.StoreHouse_Id INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs StoreHouseOrg WITH(NOLOCK) ON StoreHouseOrg.Id=dbo.StoreHouse.Id INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs City WITH(NOLOCK) ON City.Id=CostAdjustNotes.City_Id INNER JOIN dbo.Product WITH(NOLOCK) ON Product.Id = CostAdjustNotes.Product_Id INNER JOIN dbo.ProductInfo WITH(NOLOCK) ON Info_Id=ProductInfo.Id
CostAdjustNoteSqlResource.Delete: UPDATE dbo.CostAdjustNotes set IsDeleted=1,LastUpdateTime=GETDATE() WHERE Id=@Id
